page.title: 06 THE ROYAL MILITARY DEPOT
page.content: {The Depot} was begun in 1804 as a base for the supply and repair of army weapons.It used to cover over 100 acres but now covers only 32 acres.It has eight large warehouses and a series of ammunition stores as well as many other buildings.It has two gate houses with portcullises.One gatehouse has a clock on it. {The Depot} was put up for sale in 1985 and has recently been bought by a property firm.It will be converted into offices and houses. We sent a questionaire to some parents.Most people wanted the buildings left as they were(42%) and converted into either a sports centre(34%),a museum(31%) or a craft and garden centre(22%). Recently a television advertisment was filmed in the depot.
